title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Breathe easier and feel better with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 Gallon, Black—your simple, stylish solution for comfortable air all year long. Perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, home offices, and living areas up to 320 sq. ft., this compact powerhouse quietly adds soothing moisture to help relieve dry skin, scratchy throats, and winter stuffiness.

Why you’ll love it:
- Easy comfort, your way: Choose from 3 mist speeds with a smooth mechanical knob to dial in the perfect humidity level for day or night.
- Long-lasting hydration: A 1-gallon tank delivers up to 142 ml/h of cool, refreshing mist to maintain a cozy environment.
- Fresh scents, on demand: Built-in aroma tray lets you add your favorite essential oils for a spa-like feel.
- Worry-free operation: Low tank indicator and empty tank protection help prevent dry runs and keep your unit safe.
- Simple to clean: Dishwasher-safe parts make maintenance quick and hassle-free.
- Efficient and dependable: Evaporative cool mist technology for even distribution and fewer white dust concerns.
- Smart compatibility: Uses BestAir H62 replacement filters to keep performance at its best.
- Sleek, space-saving design: Lightweight at just 6.33 lbs with a modern black finish that blends into any room.

Create your ideal indoor oasis with quiet, consistent moisture and effortless maintenance. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier makes comfort simple, affordable, and stylish—so you can breathe, sleep, and live better every day.
